# ISystemConsole.SetCursorPosition method

Set the current curson position in the console. Used when reading text from an InteractiveConsole instance.

```csharp
public void SetCursorPosition(int left, int top)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| left | Left position in the console to place the cursor |
| top | Right position in the console to place the curson |
